comment: A beautifully written classic with rich symbolism and compelling characters. Fitzgerald's prose is absolutely stunning.
Fitzgerald's masterpiece captures the essence of the American Dream perfectly. A must-read for everyone.
A powerful and moving story that remains relevant today. Harper Lee's writing is both beautiful and heartbreaking.
Orwell's vision of the future is chilling and thought-provoking. More relevant now than ever before.
Jane Austen's wit and social commentary shine through in this delightful romance. Elizabeth Bennet is an amazing character.
